site.description: •Los is a virtual machine in C language compiled. It uses llvm/clang as its front end, and losld does the backend to compile the source code to generate the los directive file. The Los virtual machine is written in 100% c language and runs on mcu and pc. •los (core) accounts for about 15Kb of rom, 15Kb of lgui component, and ram 200byte. •los provides unified api interface to achieve the benefits of writing once, running everywhere, and improving code reusability.

category-def.name: com.lp.los_lgui_g
